name: Mangus RE:Joked
description:
Mangus Re:joked is a collaboration project, taking place in an alternate version of Magnus Re:Set.
Please consider playing the original game before this one to have an understanding of the contextual changes.Made by: Baku & Gimpy

This game contains copyrighted music, all of which are listed in the game's credits.
I don't own nor claim to own any of the songs used in-game.
